description:
go.exp/gotype: remove test altogether

This test is already part of go.exp/go/types.
No need to repeat it here. Eventually, gotype
should have a more specific test.

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go.exp

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

Please take another look.

LGTM
